::KitKat::

She watched as Drillbit addressed the bots. She could tellby thier 
faces that they thought more of him as lunch, than a fighter. She 
looked up at Killfest. "I was wondering, would you and your team be 
willing to step into my lab for a few moments?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Killfest/EndBringer/Demise/Greven/Scyther::
> 
> Killfest reaches forward, taking DrillBit's hand in his much bigger 
> one. He shakes the Predacon's hand firmly, looking at the bot. If 
all 
> the Predacons were this small, his team should be treated very well 
> indeed...
> 
> "As KitKat said, my name is Killfest," he says politely, while 
sizing 
> the smaller bot up. He decides that in a fight, DrillBit wouldn't 
> last a second, "And this is my team," he points to the different 
bots 
> as he lists them, "EndBringer, Demise, Greven, and Scyther."
> 
> His team, standing behind him and looking at DrillBit, was very 
> unimpressed so far. They had expected bigger bots, but these looked 
> like the colony bots they were so used to butchering. EndBringer 
and 
> Greven looked at DrillBit with half-threatening expressions. Demise 
> looked at the bot with a neutral face; the beast was hungry. 
Scyther, 
> the only one who was as short as DrillBit (or shorter), had a 
neutral 
> expression on his face, looking at KitKat's 'right hand bot'.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> > ::DrillBit::
> > 
> > He gave KitKat a quick questioning glance, at her words.
> > He held out his hand, offering to shake Killfests hand.
> > "Hello."
